==== await_unaryExpression_es6_2.ts (2 errors) ====
    async function bar1() {
        delete await 42;
               ~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2703: The operand of a 'delete' operator must be a property reference.
    }

        delete await 42;
               ~~~~~~~~

    }
